AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 10/ 2009 
 
Sub : Disposal of Liquid /Aerosols/Gels(LAGs) 
 
 
It is observed that many articles particularly Liquids/Aerosols/Gels (LAGs), 
removed by screening staff are either piled up at the screening points or are deposited 
for retrieval to the passengers, creating logistic problems.  
 
2. 
Hence, it is directed that the security staff at the screening points shall ensure 
that such security removed items shall be disposed off by the passengers concerned on 
the spot. For this purpose, the airport operators shall provide sufficient numbers of 
waste bins at the security screening points.  
 
M. Malaviya) 
I.P.S 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
